newsitem.title: KYRGYZSTAN: Kyrgyzstan's H1 GDP rises 6.8 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Kyrgyzstan's H1 GDP rises 6.8 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Kyrgyzstan's gross domestic product (GDP) grew by 6.8 percent in the first half of the year compared to same period last year, a report from the National Statistics Committee said on Tuesday.
